tool.name: 464 C01 - evaluate
tool.command:
c1_evaluate.py
/opt/bich464/c1/ogs.gff3 $gff3_data
$__user_email__ > $stdout;
# Store a copy of their file, just for curiosity's sake cp $gff3_data /opt/bich464/c1/${__user_email__}-\$(date "+%s").gff3
tool.help:
**What it does**
Validates and scores your result from the C01 exercise
